text: Geevarghese Mar Timotheos (2 February 1928 â€“ 4 June 2019) was an Indian Eastern Catholic bishop. Timotheos was born in Amayannoor, Kerala. became a priest in 1953. He served as the Bishop of Tiruvalla from 1988 until his retirement in 2003. Timotheos died on 4 June 2019 in Tiruvalla, at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2019 deaths Category:People from Kerala Category:Indian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Geevarghese Mar Timotheos
